page.title: 03ECOLOGY IN ASTON-J-M.(1)
page.content: As the grassland is chemically fertil- ised and the weeds controlled,any wild plants are to be found on the banks of the canal,river,railway and in the woods.The{soil}is sandy with heavier soil in the east and is alluvial near the river.{Flowers}found are Indian balsam,knapweed,skullcap,meadowsweet, ragwort,foxglove,agrimony,marsh cinq- foil,Himalayan balsam,reedmace,dog- rose,marshwoundwort,branched bur-reed, hedge-woundwort,climbing corydalis, wood sage,gypsywort,forget-me-nots, elecampane,wormwood,purple loose- strife,rosebay willow herb,greatwillow herb,St Johns Wort.{Trees}include oak, ash,dead and dying elms,hawthorn, holly,sycamore,Scots pine,hazel.
